text: badshah ne pocha aye aurton! us waqt ka sahih waaqea kya hai jab tum daao fareb kar ke yousuf ko us ki dili mansha se behkana chahti thi, unhone saaf jawaab diya ke maâ€™aaz Allah hum ne yousuf mein koi borai nahi payi phir to azeez ki biwi bhi bol othi ke ab to sacchi baat nithar ayi, main ne hee ose warghalaya tha, us ke ji se aur yaqinan wo saccho mein se hai
